title: Blind Alpha: A Dark Fantasy
description: At the age of sixteen, Landon becomes the alpha of Shadow Pack after a battle that killed his father, destroyed his pack, and cost him his eyesight. Being blind proves to be difficult for someone who should exude authority and take care of his territory. As a result, Landon grows frustrated, cold, and angry.While escaping her abusive pack, Lana accidentally stumbles into Shadow Pack territory. She has heard everything about this pack, including its alpha. He’s cruel and ruthless. She knows she’ll die upon stepping on their pack land, but she has no choice. Another pack wants her dead, so she’s going to have to take her chances.But Lana does not die, and she will never probably be in danger in Shadow Pack as Landon finds out she is her mate. She is sweet, kind, and oh so irresistible, but Lana also come with baggage. It’s the kind of baggage that a blind alpha needs to worry about. He could end up losing her mate and his whole pack.Will Landon and Lana be willing to sacrifice for the other, even it means death? Or will fate smile upon them and give them the happiness that they strive to have?
author: Charlotte Michelle
